title: Where is Zika virus?
content:
While the Zika virus is now considered an epidemic in many parts of Latin America and the Caribbean, in the United States, as of May 11, 2016, local mosquito-borne transmission of Zika virus has been reported only in the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico, the U.S. Virgin Islands and American Samoa, according to the Federal Centers for Disease Control and Protection (CDC).
